mapper.insert: INSERT INTO water_q (user_id, lati, longi, yinshui, model_id, location, model_water_q, model_loca, model_lati, model_longi, tongzhuangshui, yinshuiji, local_water_q, yinshui_water_q, tong_water_q, yinshuiji_water_q, zonghe_water_q, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{lati}, #{longi}, #{yinshui}, #{modelId}, #{location}, #{modelWaterQ}, #{modelLoca}, #{modelLati}, #{modelLongi}, #{tongzhuangshui}, #{yinshuiji}, #{localWaterQ}, #{yinshuiWaterQ}, #{tongWaterQ}, #{yinshuijiWaterQ}, #{zongheWaterQ}, now(), now())
